text:
need to set websphere.home property in order for websphere ejbjar task to work.

If you don't, you will get a NullPointerException.  This is not documented
creator: michael.shamberger@starwoodhotels.com
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Fixed in 1.5 branch. Please check I did not break anything. I did the fix 
blindly since I don't use webpshere. Thanks for the report.
